ygData.subject: Better than he was before
ygData.msgSnippet: Lunarpine nearly lost control when he heard the mention of Shadow Wings name. He d already gone through the pain of failing her now this madbot s reminding

Lunarpine nearly lost control when he heard the mention of Shadow 
Wings name. He'd already gone through the pain of failing her now 
this madbot's reminding him. He punched the front of his cylindrical 
(I like big words) prison trying to escape. His hand ached as it 
struck the immovable surface. He glanced down at the hand. It was the 
hand that he used to strike with but it wasn't his. Lunarpine's 
senses flooded with the realization of what had happened in his 
stasis lock. Not only did he get experimented on, he'd switched 
bodies which meant he no longer carried Shadow Wings Spark with 
him. "You monster" he howled ferociously glaring at the bot who'd 
changed him.

"So it finally sunk through your thick skull." Veratis answered "But 
you still haven't answered my question." Veratis turned his back to 
Lunarpine as if to taunt him "I'll wager a guess that you two were 
close, and that hers is the second spark in your old body. Am I 
right?"

Lunarpine didn't have to answer, Veratis had pieced together the 
equation nicely and both of them knew it. "Yes, You're right she was 
dear to me."

"Good now that you're being so talkative you may ask a question." 
Veratis was back to his kind self showing courtesy even with 
Lunarpine his prisoner instead of his guest.

"Where's my old body?" Lunarpine asked, without power her Spark would 
surely leave the body.
"It's been..."Veratis paused trying to find the right words "Taken 
care of." There was no easy way to tell someone that thier old body 
was chopped up into samples."But I placed the other spark in a safe 
place. I can help you my friend but you have to tell me exactly what 
I ask for." Again he had Lunarpines hands tied.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> ::Shadow Wing::
> 
> She felt her smile fade as Lunarpine's image disappeared.  She knew 
> he was back in the realm of the living.  She smiled again.  She 
knew 
> that he was alright and functioning again. She felt happy knowing 
> that they were still together in some way. It gave her hope that 
one 
> day, she would be joined with him again. 
> 
>

he

focussed

Lunarpine

would

the

> > my own so you could understand me." Veratis seemed sure of 
himself 
> and his
> > wacky experiments but he didn't seem to be gloating. "Now that I 
> answered

upper

> > he knew it. "Who's Shadow Wing, I got a distinct image while you 
> were
> > absent."
> >
